meeting_annotations.transcript: I will add as someone who's studied a number of different direct air capture systems and done with collaborators energetic and techno economic analysis on them all the parts are interdependent right? And so it's good to do parts on six different pieces of the whole puzzle but then as you think about pulling together collaborations and proposals that you might want to write, if you can pull together teams that can look at an integrated whole it'll be far more impactful and quite often if you optimize individual pieces and put them together it's not a global optimum.
